name: Time Out (Maximetinu)
description:
This is not a game. No, really. I didn't get to finish it on time. I wish this was a joke, a performance, or the game itself breaking the 4th wall, but it isn't. 

What is it then? Nothing. It's an open letter.

Damn. This description is counterproductive. Now I have your attention, and you're maybe hyped thinking this'll have an interesting turn of events, but it won't. I promess. If you play it waiting for something great, It won't meet your expectations.

I wonder why am I writing in English if this is a Spanish gamedev community.

Maybe this is all part of a performance and we all live in a simulation?

----------------

Credits to:

  • Kenney Assets - UI, Fonts, Characters & Town 3D  Assets
  • Limezu - Modern Interiors
  • Unity - Starter Assets
  • Unity - SNAPS Asian Residential Snaps
  • Febucci - Text Animator
